Products.name: Magento One Step Checkout
Products.description: Dramatically simplifies the checkout process by reduces checkout process from six steps to one step and increasing shopping cart conversion.

Products.name: Magento Advanced Order Number
Products.description: Advanced Order Number allow you to customize orders, credit memos, invoices, shipments numbers to meet your business aspects.

Products.name: Magento Ajax Cart Pro
Products.description: Let your customers add products to cart, wishlist and compare products with out page reload.

Products.name: Magento Stock Inventory Manager
Products.description: Magento Simple inventory management using a AJAX-Grid, with in-grid editor and one page bulk/mass update feature.

Products.name: Magento Advanced Thank You Page
Products.description: Customize order success page (Thank You page) to increase customers loyalty and motivate more sales.

Products.name: Magento Advanced Admin Products Manager
Products.description: Enhanced product grid extension which allow save up to 95% of merchants time on managing products in their Magento stores.

Products.name: Magento Admin Product Grid Images
Products.description: Displays images of every product item in admin prouct grid view. It helps you to find the required product among 1000+ existing.

Products.name: Magento Orderd Items Grid
Products.description: Order Items Grid Simple ordered items management tool, which allow you see and analyze ordered items on one page.

Products.name: Magento Advanced Orders Manager
Products.description: Convert orders grid into editable orders grid as Excel and allow you edit orders attributes right on the grid.

Products.name: Magento Ajax Mass Images Uploader
Products.description: Easy mass products images uploader allow just drag & drop images into product grid to auto upload via ajax.
